newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Plutonic takes stake in gold explorer.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Plutonic takes stake in gold explorer.

text.p: Gold miner Plutonic Resources Ltd said on Tuesday it had bought an 8.94 percent stake in gold explorer North Star Resources NL.
Plutonic said in a substantial shareholder notice to the Australian Stock Exchange (ASX) that it holds 12.0 million North Star shares.
At 11.05 a.m. (0105 GMT), North Star shares were 0.5 cents lower at 12 cents. Based on this price, Plutonic's investment in North Star is worth A$1.44 million.
